en:
HA HA !
You pressed the buzzer
Now, you'll have to press it
EVERY 10 SECONDS
You knew it was a trap\nand yet, coudn't fight the urge to press
Oh well... who am i kidding ? ...\nYou knew very well it was a trap\nI'm sure you pressed it to please me didn't you ?
This one does not like to stay in place
I love the way the cap glows when the buzzer's ready to be pressed
Ah ah, I turned the light off, you cannot see a thing\nvictory is mine
BOOOoooo!\nYou are a lousy buzzer presser
Gotcha ! You can only trust the count-down here

Oh My Good !!!
How did you manage to loose at this stage ?

YOU JUST HAVE TO PRESS THE BUZZER
EVERY 10 SECONDS !!!
